briefdescription.para: World-space contact point of the collision.
Whether this collision is a solid (physical) collision.
Whether this collision is a trigger (non-physical) collision.
Whether this entity is the collision reporter.
GUID of the other entity involved in the collision.
The collision behavior to apply.
Flag indicating whether a collision was detected this frame.
Full collision context data for event publishing.
Collision layer ID of this entity.
Collision layer ID of the other entity.
Default constructor.
Copy constructor (creates empty state).

parameterdescription.para: The component to copy from (state is not copied).

memberdef.argsstring: (helios::math::vec3f contact, const bool isSolid, const bool isTrigger, const helios::engine::modules::physics::collision::types::CollisionBehavior collisionBehavior, const bool isCollisionReporter, std::optional< helios::util::Guid > other=std::nullopt, const uint32_t collisionLayer=0, const uint32_t otherCollisionLayer=0)
memberdef.name: setState

briefdescription.para: Sets the collision state for this frame.

detaileddescription.para: This method is called by the collision detection system when a collision is detected. Only the first collision per frame is recorded.

parameterdescription.para: Whether this is a solid collision.
Whether this is a trigger collision.
The behavior to apply for this collision.
Whether this entity reports the collision.
Collision layer ID of this entity.
Collision layer ID of the other entity.

simplesect.para: True if the state was set, false if a collision was already recorded.

briefdescription.para: Resets the collision state for a new frame.

detaileddescription.para: Clears all collision flags and data. Called at the start of each frame or when the owning GameObject is acquired from a pool.

briefdescription.para: Called when the owning GameObject is acquired from a pool.

detaileddescription.para: Resets all collision state to prepare for a new lifecycle.

briefdescription.para: Returns the full collision context data.

simplesect.para: Reference to the CollisionContext struct containing all collision details.

briefdescription.para: Checks whether a collision was detected this frame.

simplesect.para: True if a collision occurred, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Returns the GUID of the other entity involved in the collision.

simplesect.para: Optional GUID of the other entity, or nullopt if not set.

briefdescription.para: Checks whether this entity is the collision reporter.

simplesect.para: True if this entity reported the collision.

briefdescription.para: Checks whether this is a solid (physical) collision.

simplesect.para: True if the collision is solid.

briefdescription.para: Checks whether this is a trigger (non-physical) collision.

simplesect.para: True if the collision is a trigger.

briefdescription.para: Returns the collision behavior for this collision.
Returns the world-space contact point of the collision.

simplesect.para: The contact point as a 3D vector.

briefdescription.para: Returns the collision layer ID of this entity.
Returns the collision layer ID of the other entity.

simplesect.para: The other entity's collision layer ID.

briefdescription.para: Stores per-frame collision state for a GameObject.

detaileddescription.para: This component is written by the collision detection system each frame to record whether a collision occurred and provide details about the collision. Game logic can query this component to react to collisions.
The state should be reset at the start of each frame by the collision system or when the owning GameObject is acquired from a pool.
